title: Rory Douglas-Speed shares adorable snap cuddling with newborn son Reggie
text:
Rory Douglas-Speed has shared an adorable snap of himself alongside his newborn son Reggie as he settles into being a father.

The Hollyoaks star, 27, who shares the tot with fiancée Nadine Mulkerrin, posted the photo to his Instagram where his son is snuggled to his chest as he told how the tiredness of being a new parent is worth it.

He wrote: 'Never had such big bags under my eyes, but it’s all worth it! #newdadspam'.

Family: Rory Douglas-Speed has shared an adorable snap of himself alongside his newborn son Reggie as he settles into being a father

In love: Rory's fiancée Nadine commented on the sweet snap of her other half and son

Nadine, 26, who plays Cleo McQueen on the soap, commented on the photo, writing: 'Oh Jesus I actually can’t cope'.

The couple welcomed their first child together on Tuesday with Nadine revealing she was up all night feeding her newborn.

Fellow Hollyoaks actor Gary Lucy commented on the photo and wrote: 'Beautiful' while Sophie Porley wrote 'Lads'.

While Reggie was well behaved on his first night, Nadine admitted it hasn't all been easy as she texted her Hollyoaks co-star Jennifer Metcalfe for advice.

New parents: The couple welcomed their first child together on Tuesday with Nadine revealing she was up all night feeding her newborn

She wrote: 'Day 1- smug motherf****r this is world most chilled well behaved silent sleepy content baby.'

'Day 2 Will this ever end. Why won't you go back in your f*****g bed. I've tried tricking him like 18 times just wants to lie on my nipple in his throat sleeping. Cheers bud.'

Soap star Jennifer became a mother herself in 2017 after having baby boy Daye with her partner and ex-Geordie Shore star Greg Lake.

The only message on Nadine's WhatsApp that could be seen from supportive friend Jennifer was sent at 20.51 and read: 'Sending all my love'.

Help: While Reggie was well behaved on his first night, Nadine admitted it hasn't all been easy as she texted her Hollyoaks co-star Jennifer Metcalfe for advice

Nadine also shared a picture of her sweet son sleeping in a white and black baby-grow which was covered in animals.

She captioned the pictured: 'But this face and Kylie Jenner lips.'

Announcing Reggie's birth, Rory, who plays Joel Dexter, wrote on Instagram: 'Welcome to the family wee Reggie Speed 15.8.19

Cute: Nadine also shared a picture of her sweet son sleeping in a white and black baby-grow which was covered in animals

Overjoyed: The couple announced the happy news they were expecting a baby with this sweet post

'We love You man. So proud of Nadine, I didn't think I could love her anymore but my heart is bloody bursting! She was amazing throughout her labour, Women are seriously Superhuman x.'

Nadine confirmed her pregnancy when she was nearly five months along back in June, shortly before the British Soap Awards.

The pair, who have been an item since 2017, announced their exciting news via Instagram.

They shared a snap and captioned it: 'That's us three ready for the @thebritishsoapawards'.

The post was also shared on Hollyoaks' official Instagram account, captioning it: 'BEST. NEWS. EVER.'

Rory and Nadine met on the set of Hollyoaks and got engaged last December after dating for a year.
description: The Hollyoaks star, 27, who shares the tot with fiancée Nadine Mulkerrin, posted the photo to his Instagram where his son is snuggled to his chest.
